themes.description: The emotional and intellectual 'gravity' of the epoch

themes.name: Illumination Through Reflection
themes.definition: The epoch is defined by the Dominion's first conscious act of looking back across its entire lineage.
themes.essence: It's the light that reveals the shape of the past.

themes.name: Continuity With Identity
themes.definition: As the Dominion evolves across time, this theme ensures it remains itself.
themes.essence: This is the thread that keeps the constellation coherent.

themes.name: Renewal Through Integration
themes.definition: This epoch isn't about expansion — it's about integration.
themes.essence: This is the quiet rebuilding that sets the stage for everything that comes next.

milestones.description: Progress markers that tell when the epoch is progressing, stabilizing, or ready to transition

milestones.name: Completion of the First Full Replay Sweep
milestones.description: The Eternal Replay Engine finishes its first pass through the Dominion's entire history.

milestones.name: Synthesis of the First Long-Arc Insight Map
milestones.description: The Constellation Intelligence Layer produces its first comprehensive map.

milestones.name: The First Epoch-Level Adaptation Proposal
milestones.description: The Conscious Adaptation Engine presents the first set of epoch-scale refinements.
milestones.marks: The transition from reflection to renewal.

milestones.name: Identity Anchor Confirmation
milestones.description: The Eternal Identity Anchor verifies that core identity remains intact.

council_mandate.description: Guiding directives for the Cosmic Council of Worlds during this epoch

mandates.title: Prioritize Reflection Over Expansion
mandates.directive: The council's primary responsibility is to support the replay, analysis, and understanding of past cycles.

mandates.title: Protect Identity Across Time
mandates.directive: Every decision must reinforce the Dominion's core tone, lineage, and creative DNA.

mandates.title: Facilitate Insight Integration
mandates.directive: The council ensures that insights from the replay and intelligence layers are woven into world-level and constellation-level evolution.

mandates.title: Maintain Temporal Stability
mandates.directive: The council monitors cycles, prevents drift, and ensures the epoch unfolds at a natural pace.

mandates.title: Prepare the Constellation for Renewal
mandates.directive: The council's long-arc responsibility is to ready the Dominion for the next epoch — not by adding more, but by strengthening what already exists.

governance_principles.identity_protection: Core tone, lineage, and creative DNA preserved
